agent: "agent"
description: "Implement a feature end-to-end in Vanilla JS ES2022 with tests"
---

You must follow .github/copilot-instructions.md.

Task:

- Implement the requested feature in src/.
- Add/Update Jest unit tests in tests/.
- If applicable, add/Update Playwright tests.
- Provide the exact commands to run tests.
- Do not stop at the first attempt: iterate until tests pass.
